text: Edward Joseph Ruscha IV (born Omaha, December 16, 1937) is an American painter, photographer and visual artist. He is a member of the pop art movement. He is famous for his minimal style of painting, often using only words taken from adverts. He lives and works in Culver City, California. ==Related pages== * List of American painters Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:American painters Category:American photographers Category:People from Nebraska
